title-part.text: PROTECTION AGAINST X-RADIATION, GAMMA RADIATION, CORPUSCULAR RADIATION OR PARTICLE BOMBARDMENT

reference.text: radiation protection by pharmaceutical means A61K8/00, A61Q17/04; in cosmonautic vehicles B64G1/54; combined with a reactor G21C11/00; combined with X-ray tubes H01J35/16; combined with X-ray apparatus H05G1/02

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Shielding characterised by the composition of the materials

CPC-specific-text.text: Concretes combined with other materials dispersed in the carrier

title-part.text: Cermets, i.e. sintered mixtures of ceramics and metals
Shielding characterised by its physical form, e.g. granules, or shape of the material

reference.text: mounting means on glove boxes G21F7/053

title-part.text: Containers for solid radioactive wastes, e.g. for ultimate disposal
Fuel element racks in the containers
for storing radioactive sources, e.g. source carriers for irradiation units

reference.text: syringe shielding for applying radioactive material to the body

title-part.text: with provision for restricted exposure of a radiation source within the container
Means for controlling exposure, e.g. time, size of aperture
Details of, or accessories to, the containers

CPC-specific-text.text: Containers provided with a rotatable drum

title-part.text: Shock-absorbers, e.g. impact buffers for containers
Heat-removal systems, e.g. using circulating fluid or cooling fins

CPC-specific-text.text: Means to monitor or detect the leak-tightness of the closure

title-part.text: Devices for handling containers or shipping-casks, e.g. transporting devices

CPC-specific-text.text: loading and unloading, filling of containers

reference.text: cranes, load-engaging elements or devices for cranes, capstans, winches or tackles B66C
chambers provided with manipulating devices in general B25J

title-part.text: Room atmosphere, temperature or pressure control devices
Observation devices permitting vision but shielding the observer

CPC-specific-text.text: Glove-box atmosphere, temperature or pressure control devices

title-part.text: Closing or transferring means between glove-boxes
Structural combination with remotely controlled apparatus, e.g. with manipulators

reference.text: manipulators B25J; remote control in general G05

CPC-specific-text.text: mounted in a wall, e.g. pivotably mounted
Remotely manipulated measuring or controlling devices
Transferring devices within cells or boxes
Decontamination of contaminated objects, apparatus, clothes, food; Preventing contamination thereof
Decontamination of the surface of objects with chemical or electrochemical processes
Decontamination of the surface of objects by ablation
Recovery of isotopes from radioactive waste, e.g. fission products

reference.text: separating different isotopes of the same chemical element B01D59/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Apparatus specially adapted for mixing or disposing radioactively contamined material

note.note-paragraph: In this group the following term is used with the meaning indicated: "liquids" mean compounds being liquid under normal temperature and pressure conditions.
Molten metals and corium are classified as solids. Muds are classified as liquids as long as they are not dried

reference.text: separating different isotopes of the same chemical element B01D59/00

title-part.text: by fixation in stable solid media

CPC-specific-text.text: in an inorganic matrix, e.g. clays, zeolites
in polymeric matrix, e.g. resins, tars

title-part.text: by storage in a tank or other container
by storage under water, e.g. in ocean
by dilution in water, e.g. in ocean, in stream

reference.text: separating different isotopes of the same chemical element B01D59/00

CPC-specific-text.text: by fixation in stable solid media

reference.text: C03B5/005 takes precedence; compositional aspects C03C

CPC-specific-text.text: in polymeric matrix, e.g. resins, tars
